attributes.action: The People of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
The People of the United Kingdom

We the undersigned,do hereby request the changing of the law,with immediate effect (after an emergency meeting in “The House of Commons”),that would see any foreign national,preaching hatred &/or violence towards the “United Kingdom”of England,Scotland,Wales & Northern Ireland,&/or the citizens of those forenamed countries,be deported back to their country of birth,with immediate effect,without leave to appeal,regardless of their pleas of persecution, torture &/or unfair trials,etc. Furthermore,we hereby request the changing of the law,that would see those deemed to be British,that would also preach hatred &/or violence towards the “United Kingdom”of England,Scotland,Wales & Northern Ireland,&/or the citizens of those forenamed countries,be immediately arrested & incarcerated,on charges of “Treason”. Treason having a mandatory 15 year sentence placed upon it, without the possibility of parole.
